name: Kings On Ice: A Yuri On Ice Fanzine
name_original: Kings On Ice: A Yuri On Ice Fanzine
description:
Kings On Ice: A Yuri On Ice Fanzine is a game developed by kingotabekzines. It was originally released in 2018.
Kings On Ice: A Yuri On Ice Fanzine is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
